item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi everyone! This post is mean to be an explanation on the different topics I’m going to write about and why I created this blog. I really love coding and cybersecurity, so those are going to be the main topics off this blog, but I will probably also write some posts on linux ricing and the different tools/ programs I like to use for my day to day Computer Engineering studies and work.
item.content:
Hi everyone!

This post is mean to be an explanation on the different topics I’m going to write about and why I created this blog.

I really love coding and cybersecurity, so those are going to be the main topics off this blog, but I will probably also write some posts on linux ricing and the different tools/ programs I like to use for my day to day Computer Engineering studies and work.

The main reason I created this blog was to document my studies and the different things I learn in the case they might be useful to someone in the future.

That’s all for this first post, see you all in the next weeks as I keep posting!
